wallet.safelyStore: Safely store and transfer your crypto and NFTs.
wallet.logInToAny: Log In to Any NEAR App
wallet.noNeedToCreate: No need to create new accounts or credentials. Connect your wallet and you are good to go!
wallet.useAWallet: Use a wallet to secure and manage your NEAR assets, and to log in to any NEAR app without the need for usernames and passwords.

connectingMessage.injected: Confirm the connection in the extension window
connectingMessage.browser: Confirm the connection in the wallet after redirect
connectingMessage.hardware: Confirm the connection in the ledger device
connectingMessage.bridge: Confirm the connection in the wallet

ledger.makeSureYourLedger: Make sure your Ledger is connected securely, and that the NEAR app is open on your device
ledger.enterYourPreferredHDPath: Enter your preferred HD path, then scan for any active accounts.
ledger.accessDeniedToUseLedgerDevice: Access denied to use Ledger device
ledger.cantFindAnyAccount: Can't find any account associated with this Ledger. Please create a new NEAR account on
ledger.failedToAutomatically: Failed to automatically find account id. Provide it manually:
ledger.overviewTheListOfAuthorized: Overview the list of authorized account(s), complete sign in by clicking the button below.

exportAccounts.selectAWallet: Select a wallet that fits your needs and supports your connected accounts.
exportAccounts.afterDecide: After you decide on a wallet, you can select which accounts you want to transfer.
exportAccounts.disclaimer: You won’t be able to transfer accounts that have never been funded or used on NEAR.
exportAccounts.warning: does not support account export at this time. Please select another wallet.

getPassphrase.title: Copy Temporary Password
getPassphrase.desc: You’ll need to enter this password when you begin exporting your accounts to a different wallet.
getPassphrase.label: Click to Copy
getPassphrase.checkLabel: I copied or wrote down the password

complete.title: Complete the Transfer
complete.descOne: You will now be redirected to the wallet you selected to complete the transfer.
complete.descTwo: Once import part of process is completed from selected wallet, press button to complete the transfer process.
